lexUnit.name: daughter-in-law.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the wife of one's son

sentence.text: So Kitty Craven had been welcomed to Lady Mead , and the Dowager died happy in the knowledge that her daughter-in-law of six months was five months pregnant .
